briefTitle: Oral Sodium Fusidate (CEM-102) for the Treatment of Staphylococcal Bone or Joint Infections
officialTitle: An Open-Label, Non-Randomized, Single-Arm, Multi-Center Study to Evaluate Oral Sodium Fusidate (CEM-102) for the Treatment of Staphylococcal Bone or Joint Infections in Subjects for Whom Chronic Antibiotic Suppressive Therapy is Indicated
summary: To evaluate the safety and effectiveness of oral sodium fusidate (CEM-102) as chronic antibiotic for the treatment of bone or joint infections.
